text: SpAd reminds you that part of your idea is contrary to a manifesto commitment. Go back 1 space.
Simplify idea in response to White Paper consultation responses. Go forward 1 space.
BEIS says your idea will result in UK failing to meet CO2 emissions targets. Miss a turn while it is re-designed.
No. 10 are not prepared to support your idea. Go back to square 1.
AGO inform you that your idea is not ECHR-compliant. Go back 2 spaces.
Welsh Govt lawyers say idea will involve legislating in area of devolved competence. Go back 1 space.
Realise that Queen's Consent will be needed. Miss a turn while write to Palace.
Scope of Bill will be wider than expected. Go back 1 space.
House Authorities say Bill potentially hybrid. Go back to square 1.
No.10 says it wants the Bill introduced before Party Conference. Go forward 3 spaces.
Supreme Court decision means that large part of policy needs rethinking. Go back 2 spaces.
PC advise that two different limbs of the policy conflict. Miss a turn while deciding what to do.
Complicated policy turns out simpler than expected once drafted, reducing clause count. Go forward 1 space.
Your legal team syndicate win the Lottery and resign en masse – miss a turn.
Treasury say proposed funding mechanism breaches government accounting conventions – need to re-design. Miss a turn.
Stakeholders respond positively to the policy on consultation. Roll again.
Another department's Part of the Bill is dropped. Shorter Bill means handling will be easier. Go forward 2 spaces.
New criminal offences in the Bill are cleared by HA. Go forward 1 space.
Your Minister is on holiday and so can't sign the section 19 HRA statement. Miss a turn waiting for her return.
PBL Committee decide that the Bill will be introduced in Commons; handling strategy was based on introduction in Lords. Go back 2 spaces.

Chief Whip reminds you that part of your idea is contrary to a DUP manifesto commitment.Roll the dice: roll 4 to 6, you have enough votes for the Bill to proceed, move forward 2 spaces; roll 1 to 3, you do not have the votes, move back 2 spaces.
